    Class and Description
    org.apache.jena.util.iterator.ArrayIterator

    org.apache.jena.util.iterator.ConcatenatedIterator
    Use Iterator iter = WrappedIterator.create( iter1 ).andThen( iter2 ) WrappedIterator
    org.apache.jena.util.iterator.Filter
    org.apache.jena.util.iterator.IteratorIterator
    use WrappedIterator.create(java.util.Iterator<T>)

    org.apache.jena.ontology.OntModel.listImportedModels()
    This method has been re-named to listSubModels, but note that to obtain the same behaviour as listImportedModels from Jena 2.4 and earlier, callers should invoke OntModel.listSubModels(boolean) with parameter true.
    org.apache.jena.ontology.impl.OntModelImpl.listImportedModels()
    This method has been re-named to listSubModels, but note that to obtain the same behaviour as listImportedModels from Jena 2.4 and earlier, callers should invoke OntModelImpl.listSubModels(boolean) with parameter true.
